data.message: I'm embarrassed that your from Michigan..is the reason you hate Trump is because all the other asshole celebrities do?? Better take a look at how their careers are going..better yet,  go take a ride down to Dearborn and see why Trump does what he does..

replies.message: Maybe he hates trump because the orange prick is an embarrassment to our country and maybe you don't because you're a sheep. Sounds about right
Maybe since you hate him he should probably stop being the main one concerned about the nasty water y'all have. Love Em. Fuck Trump!! And fuck anyone who loves him.
I'm embarrassed you can't differentiate between "your" and "you're."

Lol. Why is it that to trump supporters they think every thing is about ratings? Just from that you can see the vanity and the FD up priorities. The actually think these millionaires are worried about what trump thinks? Do they not understand they have zero respect for the orange retard? Like really. They act as if when trump became president he started whiting gold bricks and is somehow beyond critisim. Hello not even his own party respects him but their still sucking his dick.

The mans got to go not because of his politics but because he doesn't actually know what he's doing.

I have literally talked to south Korean KINDERGARTNERS with a better vocabulary.
